instruction: Cook the Rice: Cook the short-grain white rice according to package instructions. Let it cool completely before serving.
Prepare the Vegetables: Blanch the spinach in boiling water for 1 minute, then shock in ice water to preserve its bright green color. Drain well. Shred the carrots.
Sauté the Mushrooms: Heat a small amount of vegetable oil in a skillet. Sauté the sliced mushrooms until browned.
Make the Bibimbap Sauce: In a small bowl, combine the gochujang, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, and minced garlic. Whisk until smooth.

Assemble the Bibimbap: Divide the cooked rice into individual bowls. Top with the spinach, carrots, mushrooms, and bean sprouts. Drizzle with the bibimbap sauce. Garnish with green onions and toasted sesame seeds.
